description:
A free tool that can convert ISO image files to WBFS format files.

ISO to WBFS is a free game file converter, it can convert ISO disc image files to WBFS format files. If you are a Wii games user, it would be a very effective tool for you. This game utility is easy to use very much, you can complete file conversion with a few mouse clicks. Just choice an existed ISO file using "Browse" button, then click "Convert" button, that's all.
